Author: InfiniteSumLtd#9498
Content:
Is there any resource that lists the strategic (or non-strategic) partnerships announced by Komodo?

I‚Äôd like to populate the Crypto Hedgehog KMD Business page with partners, and I know some of them have been announced on the blog...I was just hoping to find a definitive / exhaustive list to make sure I don‚Äôt miss any.

Author: Mylo#8306
Content:
There‚Äôs a lot not covered.  They are all informal or formal.  They are generally not public because each dev, team member, notary node operates independently and not representative of solely kmd.

There is a formal kmd partner program in the works.

Author: phm87#7395
Content: @metaphilibert as I suggested IRL to reduce your taxes in Be, if your company is less than 1 year old and if you were in phisical person before, you can do the goodwheel to reduce taxes of about 10%

Author: metaphilibert#0926
Content: Too late for me, had to do it 9 years ago lol

Author: metaphilibert#0926
Content: But indeed good advice

Author: phm87#7395
Content: If you have/own other companies in Europe, you can invoice your belgian company. Do not be too hard with amounts to avoid pbs

Author: phm87#7395
Content: International accountant in Europe is about 5k to 10k. Then 1k to 5k per year. I heard it is worth it (guy in fr who have companies in uk, lux ...)

Author: phm87#7395
Content: There are other tricks that are not forbidden yet (bc govt is slow) as example to play with physical person and company stuff (administrative work but we can gain few %).

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: 5k for an accountant per year what

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: I pay mine 2.5k total or so in BE. Management company so not that many outgoing/ingoing invoices. For the other ones that have something like 1k ingoing/outgoing docs I pay around 1000/month allin

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Lots of optimisations possible in BE üòÉ

Author: phm87#7395
Content: In Be, I paid mine about 600-700‚Ç¨ per year when I was in physical person. Now that I have a company it should be 1.2k per year

Author: phm87#7395

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Quarterly VAT calculations make an enterprise accountant more expensive üò¶

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: GCV or BVBA?

Content: I work in Brussels as freelance but I signed with a luxemburgish company so we are doing autoregulation (no VAT on the bill and VAT is paid in Lux)

Content: I am now in BVBA

Content: yeah somethings like this but for services

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: Protip: if you order stuff on coolblue, and enter your VAT details, you can get anything delivered without VAT

Author: phm87#7395
Content: yeah but I prefer to pay VAT then the state gives me back the money (I was in autoregulation during 2 years when I worked in Lux and paid taxes in Be)

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: LIC is the legal term, doesnt matter what you sell services/goods/... just means you dont need to charge vat for sales cross borders

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: @phm87 yes, but you can buy personal stuff, have them delivered without vat and just dont register the invoice

Content: 21% discount for everything
